entry.def: If two people are cohabiting, they are living together and have a sexual relationship, but are not married.

example.ex: In Italy people hardly ever cohabit...
example.tran: 在意大利，很少有人未婚同居。

example.ex: The dentist left his wife of 15 years and openly cohabited with his receptionist...
example.tran: 那个牙医离开了和他生活了15年的妻子，与自己诊所的接待小姐公开同居。
